title: Hotels
content: We have a hotel block at the same venue as our reception, the Chicago Marriot Schaumburg.
You can book a room in the block using this link.
Rooms are $119/night and you can book anytime between now and Monday, September 18th.
If you trouble with availability of rooms, reach out and we can get the hotel to add more rooms to the block.

title: Flying
content: We recommend flying into Chicago O'Hare.
The hotel does not have an airport shuttle, but it is only a 20 minute ride from O'Hare.

title: Getting to the Ceremony
content: We have booked a shuttle bus for between the church and hotel.
There will be two trips before and after the ceremony.
The bus should leave the hotel just after 2 PM for members of the wedding party and it should return for the second trip around 2:30.
To return to the hotel, the bus will leave a few minutes after the ceremony end and once again around 4:45 PM for those who would like to stay for pictures.
There are several car rentals services available at the airport and nearby the hotel.

title: Marathon Weekend
content: The Sunday immediately following our wedding is the day of the Chicago Marathon.
If you are planning on spending anytime downtown we'd recommend avoiding Sunday, especially if you were planning on driving.
We'd also recommending avoiding downtown hotels all weekend due to much higher rates.
Suburban hotels near the venue should not be significanty affected and our hotel block will not be affected.

title: Getting Around Town
content: There are several car rentals services available at the airport and nearby the hotel.
If you would like to go into the city while you are visiting we recommend taking Metra, as there is siginificant construction on the Kennedy Expressway right now.
The Arlington Park and Itasca stations are both roughtly 10 minutes from the hotel.
